span_48: University of Utah School of Medicine
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_81: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Our goal is to develop clinicians who use the knowledge and skills honed during training to provide exemplary patient care, bringing value to health care systems and our society. Trainees have abundant interaction with our nationally recognized faculty. Residents will graduate from this program with a dynamic and robust skill set that enables continuous engagement in critical and innovative thinking. Scholarly opportunities are available and may be tailored to specific interests.

p_355: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
